version.changelog: + Added some icons + Fixed close all windows behavior + Now restores session on reload

version.name: 0.651b

version.changelog: + Script now looks for alternate items + Added Birdbird's midi-to-audio trigger + Added tooltips + Improved cycling behavior

version.name: 0.661b
version.author: Lemerchand
version.changelog: + Shift-click to view multiple pins + Only one error when items not found on load + Fixed midi to audio trigger + Script now looks for alternate items + Added Birdbird's midi-to-audio trigger

version.name: 0.665b
version.author: Lemerchand
version.changelog: + Shift-click group to select all items + Prefix all item names in a group with group name + Shift-click to view multiple pins + Am I forgetting something?

version.name: 0.6.65b
version.author: Lemerchand
version.changelog: + Shift-click group to select all items + Prefix all item names in a group with group name + Shift-click to view multiple pins + Am I forgetting something?

version.name: 1.2b
version.author: Lemerchand
version.changelog: + Save Preset input box defaults to current preset name + MST can now save presets to the Actions List!

version.name: 1.2.1b
version.author: Lemerchand
version.changelog: + Updating no longer overwrites user's settings + Exported presets now have 'MST_' as a prefix in Actions List + Save Preset input box defaults to current preset name + MST can now save presets to the Actions List!

version.name: 1.2.2b
version.author: Lemerchand
version.changelog: + Improved behavior on Preset Overwrite + Updating no longer overwrites user's settings + Exported presets now have 'MST_' as a prefix in Actions List

version.changelog: + Added sharp/flat toggle + Improved behavior on Preset Overwrite + Updating no longer overwrites user's settings + Exported presets now have 'MST_' as a prefix in Actions List

version.author: Lemerchand
version.changelog: + Option to export presets to actions as Time Selection Only (Alt+Shift+Right-click) + Fixed Default not being default on load + Added sharp/flat toggle + Improved behavior on Preset Overwrite + Updating no longer overwrites user's settings + Exported presets now have 'MST_' as a prefix in Actions List

version.author: Lemerchand
version.changelog: + Hopefully blurriness is gone for retina + Option to export presets to actions as Time Selection Only (Alt+Shift+Right-click) + Fixed Default not being default on load + Added sharp/flat toggle + Improved behavior on Preset Overwrite + Updating no longer overwrites user's settings + Exported presets now have 'MST_' as a prefix in Actions List
